name: Nextands.
description:
The story of the plot about Shadow Man from Garry's Mod.

Traveling through a dark place where you feel lonely sounds really scary, but I want to find out what this mysterious forest hides.

I hope the adventures in the lonely forest will end soon.

However, for some reason I feel uneasy for a while and have some strange dreams. Damn, I think I'm crazy because I see something strange in the real world.

I think because of such terrible adventures it gets bad.

I found out about this forest recently when someone in a coffee shop said about the very forest where people often disappear. It became interesting for me to explore this forest.

Management: Move
FlashlightsW A S D  || ArrowsF About the game:

The game was made in 2 days, and it was made for gamejam. The game will soon be released completely with normal gameplay and plot. Wait:)

So far this is a prologue where I just introduce you to my game.
